original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3421)@</color>快速射出一發具有爆發力的箭矢，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3421)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3421)@</color> quickly shoot an explosive arrow with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str (3421)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
